meta.title: Find All Updates on COVID-19 Response Webpage - Franklin Special School District

link.title: Find All Updates on COVID-19 Response Webpage - Franklin Special School District

meta.content: Find All Updates on COVID-19 Response Webpage - Franklin Special School District

For all updates and information on the FSSD’s response to the novel coronavirus-19 (COVID-19) pandemic and subsequent school closure, please check the FSSD COVID-19 Updates webpage regularly. You will find information about learning packets, free meals, other food supports, a community resource directory, and links to the CDC and Department of Health.

article.class: et_pb_post post-10572 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-announcements category-archive

div.h1: Find All Updates on COVID-19 Response Webpage

p.img: For all updates and information on the FSSD’s response to the novel coronavirus-19 (COVID-19) pandemic and subsequent school closure, please check the FSSD COVID-19 Updates webpage regularly. You will find information about learning packets, free meals, other food supports, a community resource directory, and links to the CDC and Department of Health.

div.div: The FSSD Retirement Celebration honors all employees who retire with at least 5 years of service in education.
